description: Returns the association between a configuration and a target account, organizational unit, or the root. The configuration can be a configuration policy or self-managed behavior. Only the Security Hub delegated administrator can invoke this operation from the home Region.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: The target account ID, organizational unit ID, or the root ID to retrieve the association for. AccountId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account. OrganizationalUnitId (string) --- The organizational unit ID of the target organizational unit. RootId (string) --- The ID of the organization root.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicyId
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of a configuration policy. For self-managed behavior, the value is SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The target account ID, organizational unit ID, or the root ID for which the association is retrieved.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the target is an Amazon Web Services account, organizational unit, or the organization root.

nested_items.name: AssociationType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the association between the specified target and the configuration was directly applied by the Security Hub delegated administrator or inherited from a parent.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy association was last updated.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the association between the specified target and the configuration.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The explanation for a FAILED value for AssociationStatus.
